dict.acceptation: 铸造；投掷；投射；脱落，脱皮；
铸型；演员表；轻微的斜视；投，掷骰；

sent.orig: The word cast is used in the sense of casting into a mold.
sent.trans: “造型”(Cast)的作用是“与一个模型匹配”。

sent.orig: Cyclic Activated Sludge Technology (CAST) was a type of modified Sequencing Bath Reactor (SBR) .
sent.trans: 循环式活性污泥法工艺(CAST)是序批式活性污泥法工艺(SBR)的一种变型。

sent.orig: Material: Chilled cast iron, nodular cast iron (ductile iron) , alloyed cast iron.
sent.trans: 材质：冷硬铸铁，球墨铸铁（球铁），合金铸铁。

sent.orig: The roll is compound centrifugal cast roll, it′s outer high-Cr cast iron, inner graphite cast iron.
sent.trans: 此辊外层为高铬铸铁，芯部为球墨铸铁，采用离心复合铸造。

sent.orig: Foundry Industry: According to customers drawings, cast ductile iron, cast iron, cast iron machine parts sales.
sent.trans: 铸造业：根据客户提供图纸，铸造球墨铸铁、生铁、也销售机械的铸铁配件。
